summary: This module provides a reference implementation for distributed multi‑GPU training of a Graph Isomorphism Network (GIN) combined with a multilayer perceptron classifier to perform graph property prediction. It loads OGB graph datasets, constructs DGL data loaders that operate across processes, defines the GIN layer and MLP architecture, runs a synchronized training loop with gradient averaging, and includes optional evaluation of the model.
business_intent: Offer developers and researchers a ready‑to‑run example that showcases how to scale graph neural network training across several GPUs using PyTorch and DGL, facilitating rapid prototyping and deployment of high‑performance graph property prediction pipelines.
